dashboard.body_message: You are using DCB Admin to manage the Direct Consortial Borrowing configuration for the MOBIUS consortium.

dashboard.configured_for: This installation of DCB Admin is configured for
dashboard.latest_version_text: The latest versions of DCB system components are
dashboard.see_the_releases: See the <0>releases</0> hub for more details and previous versions

dashboard_consortium_details.row1_col2: Tell us about the members in your consortium that we need to onboard and migrate
dashboard_consortium_details.row1_col3:
We know about <0>81 library agencies in MOBIUS.

We are missing basic details for <0>75 of these.
dashboard_consortium_details.row2_col2: Provide technical details we need to set up your DCB services

We know about <1>51 Host LMS instances that are needed for MOBIUS.

We are missing essential details for <1>41 of these.

We are missing mapping configurations and patron authentication details for <0>73 libraries.

We are missing test records or accounts for <1>64 libraries.

agencies.alert_text: Failed to fetch the agencies, please refresh the page.

groups.alert_text: Failed to fetch Groups, will retry. If this error persists, please refresh the page.

hostlms.alert_text: Failed to fetch HostLMS, will retry. If this error persists, please refresh the page.

mappings.add_success: {{fileName}} has been added and is ready to be uploaded.
mappings.alert_text: Failed to fetch the mappings, please refresh the page.
mappings.upload_success: {{count}} {{category}} mappings for {{code}} were added. Select “Close” to view the imported {{category}} mappings.
mappings.upload_success_replacement: {{addedCount}} {{category}} mappings for {{code}} were added and {{deletedMappingCount}} mappings were deleted. Select “Close” to view the imported {{category}} mappings
mappings.drag_n_drop: Drag and drop or click to select a file.
mappings.file_empty: {{fileName}} has no content. The file must not be empty. Please select a file with content.
mappings.file_too_large: {{fileName}} is {{fileSize}} MB. Maximum file size is {{maxSize}} MB. Please select a smaller file.
mappings.import_circulation_status: Import circulation status mappings for a Host LMS
mappings.upload_failure: The import has not completed because a problem was encountered. No mappings have been created. Select “Close”, refresh the page, and try importing again
mappings.wrong_file_type: {{fileName}} is in an unsupported format. The valid formats are {{allowedFiles}}. Please select another file.
mappings.confirmation_header: Confirm replacement of circulation status mappings
mappings.confirmation_body: {{existingMappingCount}} circulation status mappings for {{code}} will be {{deleted}} and replaced with mappings from the file “{{fileName}}.”
mappings.confirmation_warning: It will not be possible to undo the import. Please ensure you have a backup of the circulation status mappings before continuing.
mappings.validation_expected_headers: The column headers in {{fileName}} do not match the expected headers. The first three columns must be named “Local code”, “Local meaning” and “DCB code”. Please correct the column headers and retry.
mappings.validation_invalid_dcb_code: One or more values of DCB code is invalid. Valid values are “Available”, “Unavailable” and “Unknown”. DCB code can also be empty. Please correct the values and retry.
mappings.validation_no_hostlms: You must provide a Host LMS code to import mappings. Please select a Host LMS and retry.
mappings.validation_missing_values: The columns “Local code” and “Local meaning” must contain data. One or more cells in these columns is empty. Please fix and retry.

unauthorised.page_text_no_access: Sorry, you do not have access to this page.
unauthorised.page_text_contact_admin: If you think you should have access, contact your system administrator
